content: HDA-T Undercut anchor Ultimate-performance through-set undercut anchor for dynamic loads (zinc-plated) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Combines the advantages of a post-installed mechanical anchor, i.e. flexibility and immediate loading, with the performance of a cast-in-place headed stud Close spacing and small edge distance thanks to low expansion forces Self-undercutting facilitates fast and reliable installation without the need for a separate undercutting tool or additional operations The resulting keying effect provides a secure hold even in cracked concrete under dynamic loading Manufactured under an NQA-1 nuclear quality assurance program with comprehensive approvals Applications Safety-relevant, heavy-duty fastenings for all dynamic loading (shock, seismic and fatigue) in cracked or uncracked concrete, including applications in nuclear power plants Fastenings to support heavy pipes, safety barriers, industrial machines, crane rails, dorm structures, crash barriers, roof fixings, elevator tracks, bridge retrofitting etc. For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA:Material, corrosion: Zinc plated (min. 5 microns)Head configuration: Externally threadedApprovals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Nuclear (NQA-1), Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) | Head configuration | Externally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Nuclear (NQA-1), Seismic | Seismic loading | Yes | Fatigue loading | Yes | PROFIS Software | Yes | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 331545 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M10 x 100/20 - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M10/20 Undercut anchor assy - 331548 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M12 x 125/30 - Package Size 8 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M12/30 Undercut anchor assy - 331549 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M12 x 125/50 - Package Size 8 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M12/50 Undercut anchor assy - 331552 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M16 x 190/40 - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M16/40 Undercut anchor assy - 331553 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M16 x 190/60 - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M16/60 Undercut anchor assy - 339267 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M20 x 250/50 - Package Size 2 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M20/50 Undercut anchor assy - 339268 - Undercut anchor HDA-T M20 x 250/100 - Package Size 2 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-T M20/100 Undercut anchor assy
